#    Table version:	1.00
#    Table format:	Format A

#IMPORT file://include/common-control.txt
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-1963-symbols.txt
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-1963-uppercase.txt

# define duplicates first
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-symbols-duplicate.txt
#IMPORT file://include/box-line-drawing-duplicate.txt
0xE9	0x25E4	#BLACK UPPER LEFT TRIANGLE
0xFA	0x1FB7F	#RIGHT AND LOWER ONE EIGHTH BLOCK

#IMPORT file://include/box-line-drawing.txt
#IMPORT file://include/card-line-drawing.txt

0xA9	0x25E4	#BLACK UPPER LEFT TRIANGLE
0xBA	0x1FB7F	#RIGHT AND LOWER ONE EIGHTH BLOCK
0xFF	0x03C0	#GREEK SMALL LETTER PI
